name: AmazonPublisherServicesInMobiAdapter
summary: APS InMobi Adapter for integrating Amazon Publisher Services with InMobi SDK
description:
The Amazon Publisher Services InMobi Adapter enables publishers to use APS demand with InMobi mediation.
This adapter allows you to integrate Amazon demand into your InMobi waterfall.
Learn more at: https://aps.amazon.com/aps/solutions-for-mobile-app-developers/
